## PlayerCamera.setViewModelPitchesWithCamera() method

Sets whether the view model pitches up/down with the camera orientation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setViewModelPitchesWithCamera(viewModelPitchesWithCamera: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

viewModelPitchesWithCamera


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Whether the view model should pitch with the camera.

\*\*Category:\*\* Players


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Useful for first-person view models to tilt when looking up/down.
